ai-patthana16.72:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.72:0.3_0: (They are) kept rolling on the body for the mind.
ai-patthana16.72:1.1_0: Not doing so, consciousness arises in someone whose mind is not swept away. Consciousness is a condition for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.72:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
